Source Heroes of Golarion pg. 18

Statistics

Cost 3,000 gp Weight 4 lbs.

Damage 1d4 (small), 1d6 (medium); Critical x4; Range 20 ft.; Type B and P; Special -

Misfire 1 (5 ft.); Capacity 2

Category One-Handed; Proficiency Exotic

Description

This double-barreled pistol variant has its barrel attached to its stock by a hinge, enabling ammunition to be loaded quickly and easily. Reloading a breech-loader is a standard action that reloads both barrels; the @Compendium[pf-content.pf-feats.5MEcO5qLxNgAM7zs]{Rapid Reload} feat reduces this to a move action.
